!define TEST_DATA_PATH {${FITNESSE_ROOT}\files\TestData\DptLintPhase2}

!1 Taifun Style Check

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                                                                                                                                       |
|ensure|run|cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\DPT.exe LATEST Lint "${TEST_DATA_PATH}\!-TaifunUnitStyle-!.pas" "${TEST_DATA_PATH}\!-WDDT.StringTools.Styled-!.pas"|
|show  |Last Output                                                                                                                                                 |

|script|!-SlimProxy.Process-!                                                                                                                                |
|reject|run|cmd.exe /c ${WDDT_ROOT}\Projects\DPT\DPT.exe LATEST Lint "${TEST_DATA_PATH}\!-TaifunUnitStyle-!.pas" "${TEST_DATA_PATH}\!-WDDT.StringTools-!.pas"|
|show  |Last Output                                                                                                                                          |
